definition: to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards

sentences.english: And he is in prison waiting to be executed. So, he’s gonna be killed; he’s hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 他在監獄裏等着行刑，很絕望。

sentences.english: Hopes and despairs always accompany our life. But never despair of hope.
sentences.chinese: 希望和絕望總是伴隨着我們的生活，但永遠不要絕望。

sentences.english: Hopes and despairs always accompany our life. But never despair of hope.
sentences.chinese: 希望和絕望總是伴隨着我們的生活，但永遠不要絕望。

sentences.english: The three little pigs desperate to say, you see fit.
sentences.chinese: 三隻小豬絕望地說，你看着辦吧。

sentences.english: Like an animal at bay, the bandit chieftain laid about in desperation.
sentences.chinese: 土匪頭子困獸猶鬥，在絕望中向四面八方亂打一氣。

sentences.english: It is a vivid story of year upon year of despair.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個累年累月充滿絕望的故事。

sentences.english: Phil is becoming more and more desperate, because she has been out of work for 3months.
sentences.chinese: 菲爾已三個月沒有找到工作了，正變得越來越絕望。

sentences.english: It's natural for the guests to feel anger and despair as they face their ineluctable deaths.
sentences.chinese: 面對無法逃避的死亡，客人們自然會感到憤怒和絕望。

sentences.english: Inevitably, jealousy and desperation turn to enmity.
sentences.chinese: 嫉妒和絕望不可避免的轉化爲敵意。

sentences.english: Alucard: Mankind continues to fight, but it is a desperate fight to stay alive.
sentences.chinese: 人類依舊爭鬥不止，其生命本身便是一場絕望的戰鬥。

sentences.english: And as happiness is the vaguest word on earth, it's hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 那可是世界上最模糊的詞了，它讓人絕望。

sentences.english: In despair, he thought at least that he would try to get near enough to speak to Princess Rosebud.
sentences.chinese: 絕望的他想，至少可以靠公主近一些，能夠說些話。

sentences.english: I despaired, but I did not give up.
sentences.chinese: 我感到很絕望，但是我沒有放棄繼續尋找。

sentences.english: High-pressured check of father, the despair in Ling Qinggong heart unceasingly.
sentences.chinese: 父親的高壓管束，令青紅心中絕望不已。

sentences.english: The "girlfriend startled has stayed, is looking boyfriend's back, felt extremely despairs."
sentences.chinese: 女友驚呆了，望着男友的背影，感到非常絕望。

definition: to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
